form.style: background-color: #fff; position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; z-index: 9999;

div.style: font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica,sans-serif; line-height: 24px; margin: 10%; width: 80%;
div.p: We've detected that JavaScript is disabled in your browser. Would you like to proceed to legacy Twitter?

button.style: background-color: #1da1f2; border-radius: 100px; border: none; box-shadow: none; color: #fff; cursor: pointer; font-size: 14px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 20px; padding: 6px 16px;
